argument.name: Bitmap_Name
argument.description: Character. The name of a bitmap to use as the drag handle.

page.description: Specifies which bitmap to use for the "drag handle" when the toolbar is docked.
page.discussions: The {DRAG_HANDLE} command is used in modeless xdialogs that are designed to be used as toolbars (i.e. they have the {DOCKABLE} command in them). The command specifies which bitmap to use for the "drag handle" when the toolbar is docked. Both a5_toolbar_drag_horiz and a5_toolbar_drag_vert are built in bitmaps. You are free to use any bitmap that you want. The bitmap is repeated to fill the width or height of the toolbar.
